meanings.definition: A person who has recently arrived or started an activity.
meanings.sent1: The new student is a fresher in our class.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a fresher to join the team.
meanings.sent3: The fresher in the office got lost on their first day.
meanings.sent4: Like a blooming flower, the fresher brings new energy to the group.
meanings.sent5: The fresher's enthusiasm is contagious and uplifting.

meanings.definition: Something that is newly made or obtained.
meanings.sent1: The bakery just brought out a batch of freshers.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using freshers in my recipes for better results.
meanings.sent3: The fresher of the two cakes disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a fresher breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The fresher paint on the walls brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.definition: A cold drink, especially a non-alcoholic one.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the kids enjoyed a glass of fresher.
meanings.sent2: I always order a fresher when I visit this cafe.
meanings.sent3: The waiter accidentally spilled a fresher on the customer.
meanings.sent4: The lemonade tasted like a burst of sunshine in a fresher.
meanings.sent5: The barista recommended the special fresher of the day.
